titles.title_comparison: {{profession}}: comparison of {{school_1}} and {{school_2}}, what is better

descriptions.description_professions: Online service for comparing programming courses from different schools. Comparison of online programming courses - Hexlet Comparator
descriptions.description_certain_school: Overview of courses on profession {{profession}} in popular online schools - Hexlet Comparator
descriptions.description_school: Overview of courses from {{school}}. What professions are there in {{school}}, review and comparison of online school
descriptions.description_comparison: Comparison of courses by profession {{profession}} in online schools {{school_1}} and {{school_2}}. Where should you go to learn profession {{profession}}

descriptions.trial: The opportunity to try learning for free. Usually, it means access to first lessons or even courses.
descriptions.duration: The duration of the training program
descriptions.price: The total cost is based on training duration multiplied by monthly cost, excluding possible discounts
descriptions.learning: Types of presentation of the theoretical part of the training
descriptions.practice: Types of practices used to reinforce theory
descriptions.internship: Providing of internships in company projects, open sources or with partners.
descriptions.mentoring: Availability of mentors for helping the learning process and checking homework
descriptions.employment: Availability of the assistance in the employment process(resume writing, interview preparation, lists of vacancies providing)
descriptions.info: The school was founded in {{foundationDate}}. Teaching in areas: {{schoolProgramLine}}

about_page.title: About
about_page.description: Hexlet Comparator - is an open-source project created and maintained by the community of Hexlet. Join the community, publish your resumes and leave recommendations to other members. Tell your colleagues and friends about us! The source code of Hexlet Comparator platform is available on GitHub. You can participate in the development process.
